TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdvancedFilters extends System.Object

summary.span: 此类提供对某些属性的可写访问，以便用户能够在使用[按示例查询](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)时，修改传递给 对象的“虚拟”主体对象的只读属性。

span.span: This class provides writable access to certain attributes so that users can modify read-only properties of the "dummy" principal object that is passed to a object when using [Query By Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 属性从对象访问类，effectually 将其视为对象的一个属性，而不能单独使用。 The class is accessed from a object through the property, and is effectually treated like a property of the object, and isn't intended to be used on its own. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅[查询示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)主题。See the [Query By Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) topic for example code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序应通过用户对象的属性进行访问。Applications should access through the property of the user object.
